title: Drawing, Study of the upper part of the body of a running girl, ca. 1680
title_raw: Study of the upper part of the body of a running girl
medium: -a: black and white crayon; -b: Red and white crayons. On gray-blue paper.
markings: Watermark: circle with an anchor and GA above its two points, on top of a six-pointed star, below M
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Horizontal rectangle. -a: the left arm of the girl is raised; -b: verso of -a.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Study of the upper part of the body of a running girl, ca. 1680. -a: black and white crayon; -b: Red and white crayons. On gray-blue paper..
